description:
Last week I featured Kirk as "Guy #4" in an Auditions segment. I had actually met him almost a year and a half ago, but I never thought his look was right for the site.
Well, the day after posting Auditions 8 we got a lot of e-mail from people telling me I was off way base on this one. Quite a number of viewers really liked Kirk and asked to see more of him.
Way back then, Evan had also told me that he thought Kirk was hot. So when Kirk came back, I turned Evan loose with the camera for a practice session.
OK, so I have to eat crow on this one. I admit that Kirk looks sexy. In this video, he fucks himself with a blue butt plug and is not at all shy talking about his sex life. He does have a great dick too.
title: Kirk
